# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is truly exceptional and valued at $100 by many. Given its high quality and unique features, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. Considering its worth, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $95. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it represents a savings of $5 compared to its regular value. I trust you will find it worth every penny. Let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to make this purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
